column1: (1)  The following persons resident in Sri Lanka who earn foreign exchange from a resident outside Sri Lanka
(a)  an individual resident in Sri Lanka;

column2: (b)  a sole proprietorship or partnership registered in Sri Lanka where the proprietor or majority of partners are residents
in Sri Lanka (in case of a partnership with two partners, at least one partner shall be a resident in Sri Lanka);
a company incorporated in Sri Lanka;
(d)  a company incorporated outside Sri Lanka which is registered as an overseas company under the Companies Act
a State Institution with the recommendation of the Secretary to the relevant line Ministry or appropriate Authority;
an  administrator  or  executor  of  the  estate  of  a  deceased  person,  who  maintained  a  Business  Foreign  Currency
Account with  an authorised dealer or a  restricted dealer, until the completion of the administration of the deceased
(g)  a  receiver  or  liquidator,  of  a  company  that  maintained  a  Business  Foreign  Currency  Account  with  an  authorised
dealer or a restricted dealer, until proceedings are concluded.
